commit.message:
fe.h (GNAT_Mode): New.

	* fe.h (GNAT_Mode): New.                                        
	* gcc-interface/decl.c (gnat_to_gnu_entity): Do not error out on
	reverse SSO in GNAT mode.

From-SVN: r213473

files.patch:

+	* fe.h (GNAT_Mode): New.
+	* gcc-interface/decl.c (gnat_to_gnu_entity): Do not error out on
+	reverse SSO in GNAT mode.
+
 2014-08-01  Thomas Quinot  <quinot@adacore.com>
